an11.13:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
an11.13:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ vassāvāsaṃ upagantukāmo hoti.
an11.13:5.5: Tattha kammantañceva adhiṭṭhahissāmi, bhagavantañca lacchāmi kālena kālaṃ dassanāyā”ti.
an11.13:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ vassāvāsaṃ upagacchi.
an11.13:6.2: Nandiyopi kho sakko sāvatthiyaṃ vassāvāsaṃ upagacchi.
an11.13:6.3: Tattha kammantañceva adhiṭṭhāsi, bhagavantañca labhi kālena kālaṃ dassanāya.
an11.13:6.4: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū bhagavato cīvarakammaṃ karonti:
an11.13:7.4: Atha kho nandiyo sakko yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an11.13:7.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho nandiyo sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an11.13:7.10: Tesaṃ no, bhante, nānāvihārehi viharataṃ kenassa vihārena vihātabban”ti?
an11.13:8.2: Etaṃ kho, nandiya, tumhākaṃ patirūpaṃ kulaputtānaṃ, yaṃ tumhe tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā puccheyyātha:
an11.13:8.3: ‘tesaṃ no, bhante, nānāvihārehi viharataṃ kenassa vihārena vihātabban’ti?
an11.13:8.4: Saddho kho, nandiya, ārādhako hoti, no assaddho;
an11.13:8.10: Imesu kho te, nandiya, chasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya pañcasu dhammesu ajjhattaṃ sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā.
an11.13:9.2: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi, satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā’ti.
an11.13:9.3: Iti kho te, nandiya, tathāgataṃ ārabbha ajjhattaṃ sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā.
an11.13:10.1: Puna caparaṃ tvaṃ, nandiya, dhammaṃ anussareyyāsi:
an11.13:10.2: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī’ti.
an11.13:10.3: Iti kho te, nandiya, dhammaṃ ārabbha ajjhattaṃ sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā.
an11.13:11.1: Puna caparaṃ tvaṃ, nandiya, kalyāṇamitte anussareyyāsi:
an11.13:11.2: ‘lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yassa me kalyāṇamittā anukampakā atthakāmā ovādakā anusāsakā’ti.
an11.13:11.3: Iti kho te, nandiya, kalyāṇamitte ārabbha ajjhattaṃ sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā.
an11.13:12.1: Puna caparaṃ tvaṃ, nandiya, attano cāgaṃ anussareyyāsi:
an11.13:12.2: ‘lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yohaṃ maccheramalapariyuṭṭhitāya pajāya vigatamalamaccherena cetasā agāraṃ ajjhāvasāmi muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṃvibhāgarato’ti.
an11.13:12.3: Iti kho te, nandiya, cāgaṃ ārabbha ajjhattaṃ sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā.
an11.13:13.1: Puna caparaṃ tvaṃ, nandiya, devatā anussareyyāsi:
an11.13:13.2: ‘yā devatā atikkammeva kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ devatānaṃ sahabyataṃ aññataraṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ upapannā, tā karaṇīyaṃ attano na samanupassanti katassa vā paticayaṃ’.
an11.13:13.3: Seyyathāpi, nandiya, bhikkhu asamayavimutto karaṇīyaṃ attano na samanupassati katassa vā paticayaṃ;
an11.13:13.4: evamevaṃ kho, nandiya, yā tā devatā atikkammeva kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ devatānaṃ sahabyataṃ aññataraṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ upapannā, tā karaṇīyaṃ attano na samanupassanti katassa vā paticayaṃ.
an11.13:13.5: Iti kho te, nandiya, devatā ārabbha ajjhattaṃ sati upaṭṭhāpetabbā.
an11.13:14.1: Imehi kho, nandiya, ekādasahi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako pajahateva pāpake akusale dhamme, na upādiyati.
an11.13:14.2: Seyyathāpi, nandiya, kumbho nikkujjo vamateva udakaṃ, no vantaṃ paccāvamati;
an11.13:14.3: seyyathāpi vā pana, nandiya, sukkhe tiṇadāye aggi mutto ḍahaññeva gacchati, no daḍḍhaṃ paccudāvattati;
an11.13:14.4: evamevaṃ kho, nandiya, imehi ekādasahi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako pajahateva pāpake akusale dhamme, na upādiyatī”ti.
